tool.name: SNP Sort/Filter
tool.description: Filter and sort a SNP table by a list of SNP ranges
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Example SNP Panel**: Takes a merged snp table and a tab delimited file of snp ranges for filtering in the format:
------
molecule start stop NC_011353.1 273971 274038 NC_011353.1 275213 276349 NC_011353.1 302573 314525 NC_011353.1 314624 332282 NC_011353.1 894469 933073
------
.. class:: infomark
**Tool Author**
Mando Rodriguez, with consulting from Brigida Rusconi
------
.. class:: infomark
**Tool Help and Usage**
::
usage: snp_sort.py [-h] -s snp_panel_file -f exclude_file [-o sorted_snp_output_file] [-l [EXCLUDE_LIST [EXCLUDE_LIST ...]]]
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -s snp_panel_file, --snp-table snp_panel_file a snp table file -f exclude_file, --exclude-file exclude_file a template file -o sorted_snp_output_file, --out sorted_snp_output_file Output file for the merged table -l [EXCLUDE_LIST [EXCLUDE_LIST ...]], --exclude-list [EXCLUDE_LIST [EXCLUDE_LIST ...]] a list places to cull in the form: molecule_name:start _pos,stop_pos|start_pos,stop_pos|.../molecule_name:sta rt_pos,stop_pos/molecule_name:start_pos,stop_pos With molecule name, colon, then pipe delimited list of start,stop positions.
